# EmptyState Component

### EmptyState

**Exports:**
- `EmptyState.Root` - Empty state container component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { EmptyState, ChartBarPeak } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<EmptyState.Root
  description="A message conveying the state of the product."
  icon={ChartBarPeak}
  title="Title"
/>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/empty-state for full documentation and examples.
